    1 [+] * Model 2a, lottery PT * maximum likelihood estimation of risk attitudes (CRRA utility) under PT (Tversky and Kahneman 1992) * U(x) = (x^(1-r))/(1-r) * allows for subjects to make structural error in the comparison of the two EUs * (Harrison, List, Towe; Econometrica 2007)

    52 [+] ml model lf ML_lotteryPT (alpha: c prob1l prob2l prob1r prob2r m1 m2 m3 m4 = dem_age dem_econ dem_female dem_stats dem_uniyear) (gamma: ) (noise: ) , cluster(id) technique(nr)

    57 [+] ml graph 
    • ml graph
    All properties 
    key content
    command ml
    indent 0
    parameters graph


    • Content

      * Model 2a, lottery PT
* maximum likelihood estimation of risk attitudes (CRRA utility) under PT (Tversky and Kahneman 1992)
* U(x) = (x^(1-r))/(1-r)
* allows for subjects to make structural error in the comparison of the two EUs
* (Harrison, List, Towe; Econometrica 2007)

clear all
cd "C:\Documents and Settings\Redzo\Desktop\current Research\risk aversion"
capture log close
log using lotteryPT.log, replace
use lottery.dta, clear

* Note left = A, right=B
* only gains in 'lottery' choices

program define ML_lotteryPT
args lnf alpha gamma noise

tempvar c prob1l prob2l prob1r prob2r 
tempvar m1 m2 m3 m4 u1 u2 u3 u4 euL euR euDiff tmp

gen double `c' = $ML_y1

generate double `tmp' = (($ML_y2^`gamma')+($ML_y3^`gamma'))^(1/`gamma')
gen double `prob1l' = ($ML_y2^`gamma')/`tmp'
gen double `prob2l' = ($ML_y3^`gamma')/`tmp'

replace `tmp' = (($ML_y4^`gamma')+($ML_y5^`gamma'))^(1/`gamma')
gen double `prob1r' = ($ML_y4^`gamma')/`tmp'
gen double `prob2r' = ($ML_y5^`gamma')/`tmp'

gen double `m1' = $ML_y6
gen double `m2' = $ML_y7
gen double `m3' = $ML_y8
gen double `m4' = $ML_y9

gen double `u1' = (`m1'^(1-`alpha'))/(1-`alpha') 
gen double `u2' = (`m2'^(1-`alpha'))/(1-`alpha') 
gen double `u3' = (`m3'^(1-`alpha'))/(1-`alpha') 
gen double `u4' = (`m4'^(1-`alpha'))/(1-`alpha') 

gen double `euL' = (`prob1l'*`u1') + (`prob2l'*`u2')
gen double `euR' = (`prob1r'*`u3') + (`prob2r'*`u4')

generate double `euDiff' = (`euL'-`euR')/`noise'

* evaluate the likelihood
quietly replace `lnf' = ln(normal(`euDiff')) if `c'==1
quietly replace `lnf' = ln(1-normal(`euDiff')) if `c'==0

end
ml model lf ML_lotteryPT (alpha: c prob1l prob2l prob1r prob2r m1 m2 m3 m4 = dem_age dem_econ dem_female dem_stats dem_uniyear) (gamma: ) (noise: ), cluster(id) technique(nr) 
ml check
ml search
ml maximize, difficult

ml graph
